comments:
build i0428-1424 with core/ui/team loaded into workspace.
I ran a runtime workbench.

Probable concurrency issue.

- I started my runtime workbench
- already had about 30 projects (full source loaded from HEAD)
- cvs decorators were already on as well
- workspace started building
- went into Preferences and disabled auto-build
- opened the progress view and cancelled the build
- went to the navigator and selected all projects
- hit "del" and "yes" to delete contents
- got the following problems

Maybe a concurrency issue...trying to show decorators as I am deleting files
from underneath?

isCVSFolder
We now catch this in the sync file reader and return null for the sync info.
